name: Paramorfosi
description:
Paramorfosi is a horror atmospheric third-person exploration game involving dangerous situations. the player must find 4 torches and an artifact in order to vanquish a malignant entity taking possession of an entire town. as the player explores he requires to find useful items in order to solve problems or to save themselves from certain death.
In addition the game includes Eevy's simulation room an Action-adventure mini-game accessible by clicking the PI symbol at the bottom right corner of the screen
